etymology.description: Depicts a grid symbolizing a well's structure
etymology.interpretation: The character 井(井) (jǐng, "well") visually represents the framework or grid of wooden or stone beams that would make up the top view of a traditional well, highlighting its function and design.

examples.chinese: 村口有一口老井(村口有一口老井)。
examples.english: There is an old well at the village entrance.

examples.chinese: 夏天酷热时(夏天酷熱時)，井水带来阵阵凉意(井水帶來陣陣涼意)。
examples.pinyin: Xiàtiān kùrè shí, jǐng shuǐ dàilái zhèn zhèn liángyì.
examples.english: In the scorching summer, well water brings a refreshing coolness.
